original_text: The drunk people of Samaria think that their city is great. But their enemies will knock it down and walk all over it.
korean_text: 에브라임의 술취한 자들의 교만한 면류관이 발에 밟힐 것이라

sentences.original_text: The drunk people of Samaria think
But their enemies will knock it down
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들의 원수들이 그것을 무너뜨릴 것이다
